sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-container>
      <el-header style="border-bottom: 1px solid lightgray;">
        <el-tabs v-model="activeTab" @tab-click="handleTabClick">
          <el-tab-pane label="查看买家消息" name="buyer"></el-tab-pane>
          <el-tab-pane label="查看卖家消息" name="seller"></el-tab-pane>
        </el-tabs>
      </el-header>
      <el-header style="border-bottom: 1px solid lightgray;">
        <el-notification-group v-if="activeTab === 'buyer'" :data="buyerMessages"></el-notification-group>
        <el-notification-group v-else-if="activeTab === 'seller'" :data="sellerMessages"></el-notification-group>
      </el-header>
      <el-header>
        <el-button-group>
          <el-button type="danger" @click="clearAllMessages">清除所有消息</el-button>
          <el-switch v-model="showRead" active-text="显示已读消息" inactive-text="隐藏已读消息"></el-switch>
        </el-button-group>
      </el-header>
    </el-container>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import { ref } from "vue";
  export default {
    
    setup() {
      const activeTab = ref("buyer"); // 当前激活的标签页
      const showRead = ref(true); // 是否显示已读消息
      const buyerMessages = ref([ // 买家消息的数据
        {
          title: "订单确认",
          message: "您的订单已经确认，我们将尽快发货，感谢您的购买。",
          type: "success",
          read: false, // 是否已读
        },
        {
          title: "退款申请",
          message: "您申请的退款已经通过，款项将在3个工作日内到账，请注意查收。",
          type: "warning",
          read: true,
        },
      ]);
      const sellerMessages = ref([ // 卖家消息的数据
        {
          title: "库存不足",
          message: "您的商品库存不足，请及时补货，以免影响销量。",
          type: "error",
          read: false,
        },
        {
          title: "评价提醒",
          message: "您有一条新的评价，请及时查看并回复。",
          type: "info",
          read: true,
        },
      ]);
  
      // 处理标签页点击事件
      const handleTabClick = (tab) => {
        console.log("当前点击的标签页是：" + tab.name);
      };
  
      // 清除所有消息
      const clearAllMessages = () => {
        buyerMessages.value = [];
        sellerMessages.value = [];
      };
  
      return {
        activeTab,
        showRead,
        buyerMessages,
        sellerMessages,
        handleTabClick,
        clearAllMessages,
      };
    },
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .el-header {
    height: auto;
  }
  </style>
